Hi everyone ,

A month ago I was searching for a cheap email hosting service for one of my side project. After a long search I come across MXroute and their recently launched reseller plans, so I’ve decided to give it a try and launch a email hosting service using MXroute infrastructure. I’ve launched today on Product Hunt and I’ve already got my first customer. I’m opened to criticism and constructive feedback. This is my first project I’ve decided to share it with the world.

The plans are as follows:

Basic
$0.99/month or $5.99/year
1 domain
2 mailboxes
1 GB of storage
Live Chat & Ticket Support

Standard
$1.49/month or $8.99/year
1 domain
4 mailboxes
2 GB of storage
Live Chat & Ticket Support

Pro
$1.99/month or $11.99/year
Unlimited domain
Unlimited mailboxes
5 GB of storage
Live Chat & Ticket Support

You can find more and order the plans on our website https://simplimail.co/.

The company who operates the website is registered in Europe, Romania. The registration number is 38140354 and we have a EU VAT ID RO42116052.

I’m very eager to hear your opinions and feedback.
